title: Picsart Ignite 2.0: AI for Creators
author: Davit Avoyan
excerpt: Picsart is the world’s largest creative platform, powered by AI. From everyday creators to marketers, millions use Picsart to design and generate standout content fast—across photo, video, and more. With one of the largest open-source content libraries, plus powerful APIs and SDKs for businesses, Picsart is available on web and mobile. Start creating at picsart.com.
